EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-0530-AI-Optimize-Kubernetes.ES-2018-05-24 Kubernetes 6.1 Prospects 1.ES
EmailTemplate.subject: Introduction to Self-Managing Kubernetes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Kubernetes has taken the lead among container platforms, but its promise of speed and elasticity comes with a steep learning curve. With the release of Turbonomic 6.1, our AI-powered decision engineer now continuously optimizes Kubernetes environments.
What does this mean for your IT organization? We invite you to find out at our upcoming live webinar, Self-Managing Kubernetes <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTVdFellUQTNNVFJqWVRWaCIsInQiOiJIK1VPK0N2bVB5U3pYNUZtRllWQlA4NEpIZVVpb29Fang1OXRjRXcwd1k2U1FvS1B4c1I5YXM1Ukk0Qjk2U2FNcjI3MktcL2VoN0hZNzlTUXJwUVhGU2c9PSJ9]]>, on May 30th at 11 am ET, to find out. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>
Listen to Eva Tuczai, Advanced Engineering Engagement and Product Manager, as she explains how to automate rescheduling of pods, scale Kubernetes clusters intelligently and automatically, and how you can unite DevOps and Infrastructure to assure performance and enable true elasticity.
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join us live, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward. © Turbonomic, Inc.
